attributes.action: Protect wildlfe and greenbelt area of Havering
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Conservative led administrattion, of the London Borough of Havering, decided at a full cabinet meeting to sell of large areas of green spaces, one perticular site consisting of 2.29 acres in it's entirety, has been earmarked to be concreted over with a new housing developement, it is based at a outstanding areea of beauty in Harrow lodge park Hornchurch Esssex, also present on the propsed area is several trees, which were planted in 1995 to commemorate fifty years of peace after the second world war, and in remembrance of those whom fought in the war locally whom had lossed their lives, and a tree preservation order was issued upon these trees.
There is a abundance of wildlife in evidence at this site including a RSPB schedule one part one bird species (Kingfisher) and is protected under the Wildlife and counryside Act 1981, there is also many schedule two species present, and therefore request through this petition that the cabinet decision of the London Borough of Havering be recinded, and that those visiting this site, please sign in support of this petition.
